patterns: How big Manit is, area wise?
what is the Infrastructure of Manit?
responses: The mesmerizing all-embracing campus is of 650 acres, encompassed by boundary wall and ring road. The infrastructure of campus consists of administrative and academic buildings, workshops, community centre and residential area for accommodation of students and staff. Besides general infrastructure it includes elementary amenities such as post office, shopping complex, a school for children, dispensary, a campus temple, an auditorium with capacity of seating thousand people and sports complex with vast stretches of open area.

patterns: What is the full form of manit?
responses: MANIT stands for Maulana Azad National Institute Of Technology.

Maulana Azad National Institute of Technology (MANIT Bhopal), also known as National Institute of Technology, Bhopal (NIT Bhopal, NIT-B), formerly Maulana Azad College of Technology (MACT) and Regional Engineering College Bhopal, is an Institute of National Importance under the NIT Act in Bhopal, Madhya Pradesh, India. It is part of the group of publicly funded institutions in India known as National Institute of Technology.

patterns: What is the full form of manit?
responses: MACT is another name for MANIT. MANIT stands for Maulana Azad National Institute Of Technology.

MACT is another name for MANIT. Maulana Azad National Institute of Technology (MANIT Bhopal), also known as National Institute of Technology, Bhopal (NIT Bhopal, NIT-B), formerly Maulana Azad College of Technology (MACT) and Regional Engineering College Bhopal, is an Institute of National Importance under the NIT Act in Bhopal, Madhya Pradesh, India. It is part of the group of publicly funded institutions in India known as National Institute of Technology.

patterns: What is the condition of students for intern?
responses: On an average a good number of students do get intern.
An internship is an essential step to launching our career. Students look for an internship based on their major, or a particular industry category, to gain relevant career experience.

patterns: What is the condition of placement in manit?
responses: Over 145 companies participate in the placement process every year. The average compensation during the current year is over 7.0 LPA and the highest ever being around 1.1 crore per annum.

With an increasing trust being placed on Institute-Industry interaction, it is my sincere belief that our esteemed organization and NIT Bhopal stand to gain immensely from the symbiotic relationship and thus have a good placement record.

patterns: What is the time table for the exam?
Where is the centre for the exam?
responses: Usually for odd semesters mini test, mid term and end term are held in the month of September, October and November respectively. For even semesters mini test, mid term and end term are held in the month of February, March and April respectively. Once date is announced, further information will be provide subsequently.

patterns: Where is the nearest place to entertain?
Where is the nearest place to enjoy?
responses: Steeped in rich history and an intriguing past, Bhopal, the capital city of Indian state of Madhya Pradesh, is a true paradise for historians, archaeologists, art & architecture patrons and off-course, curious travellers. Dotted with ancient monuments, historical palaces, religious shrines and numerous museums that speak out the tales of bygone times, the place tops the list of tourism destinations in Central India. While needless to say, the city is a treasure trove of historical and archaeological sites, there are many recreational activities and things to do for even casual holiday seekers.
There are 5 working days and Saturday and Sunday are holidays. For more holidays, refer institute calender.
Students ride their private vehicle. Cab can leave you at your doorstep inside manit.

patterns: How many different departments are there?
responses: There are mainly 5 departments namely Engineering, Architecture and Planning , Management studies, science and humanities.

patterns: Which are the various socities in MANIT?
Which are the various clubs in MANIT?
responses: Indian Society for Technical Education (ISTE), Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineering (IEEE), Vision, AZAD, Rajbhasha Samiti, Intellect Browsers' Consortium (IBC), Drishtant, ROOBAROO are some of the active clubs or socities in MANIT

patterns: Which are the various technical socities in MANIT?

responses: Vision, AZAD, Robocon, SAE MANIT etc. are the prominent technical socities in MANIT

patterns: Which are the various mangement socities in MANIT?

responses: Indian Society for Technical Education (ISTE), Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineering (IEEE) are some of the active management clubs or socities in MANIT

patterns: Which is the annual tech fest of MANIT?
responses: TechnoSearch is the annual tech fest of MANIT which boasts a number of skill oriented technical events.

patterns: Which is the annual cultural fest of MANIT?
responses: MAFFICK is the annual cultural fest of MANIT which boasts a number of cultural events including performances from famous personalities in the field of entertainment.
